description.value:
You speak a bizarre koan that transcends language and is understood by only one creature within 30 feet. The target must attempt a @Check[will|against:exemplar] save against your class DC. It's then immune to this ability for 1 hour.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 1} for 1 round.

Failure The target is stupefied 1 for [[/gmr 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

Critical Failure The target is stupefied 1 and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Confused] for [[/gmr 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

publication.title: Pathfinder #217: Death Sails a Wine-Dark Sea
